div.font: (It is assumed that the current accumulated fees of the protocol at the start of the action are all equal to zero; if they are not zero, then they must be subtracted from the current balances before calculations)

div.style: border-color: var(--border-color);

span.style: background-color: initial; font-family: "Courier New"; border-color: var(--border-color);

li.span: utput assets amounts according to the protocol's logic:

ul.li: Solve f(z; D0, x + x_u, y) = 0 numericallyÂ to receive new balance of Z value z';

li.font: Apply fees to the (z - z') difference to receive the final value z_u received by user and protocol fee z_p;

ul.li: Solve f(D; x + x_u, y, z - z_u - z_p) = 0 numericallyÂ to receive new invariant value D2;

li.font: Â Put the calculated values ââof the assetsÂ amountsÂ into theÂ Â corresponding outputs and new invariant value D2 with updatedÂ Â protocol fees into the pool's data.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
